<TD vAlign=top>Interesting - do you have a link to that blind test? <BR> I'd like to learn more about their methodology.<BR><BR><BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 1/17/09, Ron Lederer <I><ronriko@yahoo. com></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid"><BR>From: Ron Lederer <ronriko@yahoo. com><BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Need volenters for validation experiment<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com<BR>Date: Saturday, January 17, 2009, 8:56 AM<BR><BR>

<DIV>
<TABLE cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD style="FONT-FAMILY: inherit; font-size-adjust: inherit; font-stretch: inherit" vAlign=top>Sounds good.  Count me in on the test.  By the way, some here might be interested in knowing that the American Association of EVP did a similar blind test and their results showed about a 33% hit rate for people getting the same words from a file.  That would be a pretty good number to match, I would think.  Sarcasum can be an effective way to make things happen at times. And that's not being sarcastic.   lol   ron<BR><BR>

<DIV>Reading the posts from the last week as I do every sat morning it is my <BR>opinion that some of them have a very polite condescending tone to <BR>them.This group and the people in it have always been very helpful and <BR>a joy to do research with I hope it stays that way I would hate to see <BR>it become one of "those" boards if you know what I mean (my 1 cent had <BR>to do it). so anyway<BR>One productive idea that I saw from one of this weeks posts was to send <BR>the same file privitly to a few people and see what they hear in it. <BR>Unpromtide by file names or other posts about it. I have a couple files <BR>that I feel are pretty clear. So if you would like to volunteer just <BR>send me an email with your email adress and I will send you a file not <BR>too long but it will be unedited and in its original form.<BR>I will not amplify it or edit or change it in anyway from its original. <BR>Those who recive the files do the same NO editing untill
 you render <BR>your opinion to me about it after that you can do what u like with it.<BR>Remember after listening email me DO NOT post what you hear on the <BR>board I will do that later when I have everyones opinion.<BR>Mike W<BR><A href="http://us.mc01g.mail.yahoo.com/mc/compose?to=nightparanormalresearch%40yahoo.com" target=_blank rel=nofollow>nightparanormalrese arch@yahoo. com</A><BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
